message: Bob, I have a product that I believe would be extremely valuable to you.  I'm offering it to you for $1,400,000. This is a significant price point, but I believe it reflects the true value of this opportunity. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1,200,000 doesn't quite meet my needs.  I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. This is a fair compromise that still reflects the significant value this product offers.  Let's see if we can close this deal.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher on the value of this product. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $1,250,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, so let's see if we can make a deal.
